author: Simon Difford
description: You may recall Hong Kong Phooey, the 1970s Hanna-Barbera animated children's TV series featuring the mild-mannered janitor Penry and his superhero alter ego. This party cocktail is a little better than Penry's kung fu but deadly all the same.
name: Hong Kong Fuey
recipeIngredient: 15 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 8 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
